Home > Fatburger Hours of Operation Find your store hours of operation. (e.g. Fatburger hours of operation)
Fatburger
* Note that Fatburger fast food restaurant may vary in closing, opening and sunday hours of operation by state and city. The following Fatburger hours are the average store hours nationwide and pertain to most stores. **CL= Closed fast food restaurant hours Sunday 10:00 - 9:00 Monday 10:00 - 10:00 Tuesday 10:00 - 10:00 Wednesday 10:00 - 10:00 Thursday 10:00 - 10:00 Friday 10:00 - 10:00 Saturday 10:00 - 10:00 Leave us your feedback by leaving us a +1. The only webpage with actual store hours.
